Class GuiFactory

  • public class GuiFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory for creating Gui Components

      • makeGuiTexture

        public GuiTexture makeGuiTexture(java.lang.String textureName,
                        org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector2f position,
                        org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector2f scale)
        Creates a GuiTexture with the specified texture, position and scale.
        Parameters:
        textureName - Texture
        position - Position on the display x(0-1) y(0-1)
        scale - scale of the texture on display x(0-1) y(0-1)
        Returns:
        The GuiTexture created
